verbose_text: The expression of six ISGs (IFI27, IFI44L, IFIT1, ISIG15, RSAD2, SIGLEC1) have been measured and used to calculate an IS in the majority of studies involving patients with IMIDs : these ISGs have the greatest differential expression between healthy individuals and patients with Aicardi-Goutieres syndrome (AGS), the first defined type I interferonopathy [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression of six ISGs (IFI27, IFI44L, IFIT1
